name: Truckmarks VR
description:
TRUCKMARKS VR is a car racing game based on classic foundations. Originally created for android devices and now is the time for play it in  VR !

  • 6 tracks 
  • 7 cars
  •  2 control modes
  •  spectacular graphics
  •  destructive environment
  •  fast and intense gameplay

The Oculus GO version currently supports Oculus GO and Gear VR only with (Right handed) 3DOF controllers.

The PC version is supported all VIVE (standard, Pro, Cosmos, Elite, etc...) (OpenVR) Headset. It's also should support other devices like Oculus or Valve Index, but this was not tested!
